code: import React from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{selectedMonth,setSelectedMonth,availableMonths}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/logo.png",alt:"Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"\u6708\u5EA6\u6570\u636E\u5206\u6790\u770B\u677F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"month-selector",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedMonth,onChange:e=>setSelectedMonth(e.target.value),className:"month-select",children:availableMonths.map((month,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"".concat(month.year,"-").concat(month.month),children:month.label},index))})})]})})});};export default Header;
